name: OdeToCode
description: OdeToCode is an homage to poetry and technology. The users can discover new poems, search for their favourite ones and write reflections about them in a dedicated journal.

name: Weather Dashboard
live-app: The app allows users to consult today's weather as well as a 5-day forecast for the cities of their choice. It retrieves data using the Open Weather API.

name: Coding Quiz
description: A multiple-choice coding quiz that can keep track of scores and quiz-takers' initials. It enables users to train on coding quiz challenges to prepare for exams or interviews.

name: Workday Scheduler
description: A simple calendar app allowing users to save events for each hour of their working day.

name: Password Generator
description: Helps users to create strong passwords for their online accounts. Users can customize the length and chose to include special characters, numbers, uppercase and lowercase characters.
